description: Chocolates stay fit for Valentine's by indulging in 'exer-sweets', a playful take on exercise.
title: Sweet Fitness
n_1: Choco, feeling sluggish, eyes Fudge hopping around energetically.
n_2: Inspired, Choco joins Fudge in a confectionary workout session.
c1_2: I'm feeling the burn... and it's sweet!
c2_2: Keep it up! No pain, no gain!
n_3: They laugh, sharing a wholesome moment of joy and sweets.
c1_3: Who knew fitness could be so delicious?
c2_3: With 'exer-sweets', every day is Valentine's Day!
n_4: Their laughter echoes, a testament to friendship and fitness.
c1_4: Thanks, Fudge, I'm ready for Valentine's now!
c2_4: Anytime, Choco! Here's to our sweet success!
